Edges-Phantom -- Male Human Legendary Phantom
Attributes (13 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d10 Strength: d10 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes: Strong Spirit: +1 Spirit Step
Skills (20 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d6 Healing: (sma) d6 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Stealth: (agi) d8
Faith: (spi) d8 Notice: (sma) d6 Taunt: (sma) d4
Fighting: (agi) d6 Occult: (sma) d4 Thievery: (agi) d4
Gambling: (sma) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d6
Size: 0
Advances: 16 Improvement Points: 36 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 16; Edge: 12; Skill: 8
Features
Edges (8 points): Chilling Touch; Crossover; Invisibility; Mystic Powers (Phantom (Poltergeist)); Mystic Powers (Phantom (Shade)); Mystic Powers (Phantom (Wraith)); Phantom; Roar Hindrances: Hesitant; Poverty; Vengeful+ Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Phantom: Has Ageless, Darkvision, Doesn't Breathe, Ethereal, Flight, Immune To Disease And Poison, Rage, Strong Spirit, and Weakness (Salt) features
Ageless: Does not age
Crossover: May network with other spirits
Darkvision: R10" Ignores illumination penalties and 2 points from invisibility
Ethereal: Unaffected by the physical world; may change to or from corporeal 1/rd
Invisibility: May become invisible while ethereal
Poverty: Starts with half funds and loses half of funds each wk
Vengeful+: Seeks revenge by any means
Weakness (Salt): Cannot cross a salt barrier and suffers Shaken on contact
Combat
Parry: 8 (3) Cover: 4 Toughness: 10 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Flak Jacket Shield: Riot Shield Weapons: Chainsaw (2d6+4); Holy Water Spray (None R1"); SAW (2d8 R30" AP 2); Unarmed (d10+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +3 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Chilling Touch: Touch ignores nonmagical armor and inflicts d10+d4 damage
Doesn't Breathe: Has immunity to inhaled toxins and suffocation
Flight: Fly Pace 12
Hesitant: Uses the lowest of 2 Action Cards
Immune To Disease And Poison: Has immunity to disease and poison
Rage: May spend a Benny to gain supernatural powers 1/session; suffers a major psychosis afterward (Spirit-2 neg)
Roar: May make an Intimidation Test against all targets in a 9" cone
Arcana
Power Points: 30
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Mystic Powers (Phantom (Poltergeist)): 10 Power Points
Mystic Powers (Phantom (Shade)): 10 Power Points
Mystic Powers (Phantom (Wraith)): 10 Power Points
Mystic Powers (Phantom (Poltergeist))-1: May cast Havoc, Illusionary Horrors, Sound/Silence, or Telekinesis for 2 PP (+2 PP for Raise)
Mystic Powers (Phantom (Shade))-1: May cast Confusion, Elemental Manipulation, Fear, or Puppet for 2 PP (+2 PP for Raise)
Mystic Powers (Phantom (Wraith))-1: May cast Blind, Light/Darkness, Sloth, or Stun for 2 PP (+2 PP for Raise)
